title: Crowley confesses his love - good omens animatic
author: saint salem
comment:
Wow! Thank you guys so much for 30k views! I'm so glad you guys enjoyed this so much. 
If you want, the prophet hath finally arrived to bring the completed fanfic based on this!

https://archiveofourown.org/works/21345157/chapters/50839402#workskin

Man now I want a fanfiction based on this. Like, maybe God cursed Aziraphale to be a demon by night, since he gave away his sword and lied to her, but since he did it for altruistic reasons he'd still be an angel during the day?
i would pay a good sum of 7$ to see the whole shrek movie but with the cast of good omens
I've never heard Shrek in English before so I couldn't tell at first what was this from. Then I heard "Shrek" and couldn't stop laughing XD
I never thought that shrek and good omens would combined into somthing so beautiful. I love it. 10/10 👌💙
description:
I’m laughing too hard at this. I regret absolutely nothing—

Audio belongs to Shrek
Characters belong to Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett 
Art is mine
